tool_description:
*for my personal study purposes*
An API showing all front-page news in the Bay area for the day, keyword can be customized.
eg:  https://sfnews-api.herokuapp.com/news/safe (keyword "safe")
Scrapping from San Francisco Chronicle / SFGATE / abc7News
Heroku: https://sfnews-api.herokuapp.com/
name: News In Bay
title: News In Bay

api_list.name: Get San Francisco Chronicle news
api_list.description: Get all news titled with keyword (sources via San Francisco Chronicle )

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: Get all news titled with keyword (sources via San Francisco Chronicle / SFGATE / abc7News)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-in-bay.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-in-bay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-in-bay.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-in-bay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
